title: Executive Order 7051-Authorizing the Appointment of Guy C. Hanna to a Position in the Treasury Department Without Regard to Civil-Service Rules
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by the provisions of paragraph Eighth of subdivision SECOND of section 2 of the Civil Service Act of January 16, 1883 (22 Stat. 403, 404), it is hereby ordered that Guy C. Hanna may be appointed as non-attorney member of the Committee on Enrollment and Disbarment, Treasury Department, without compliance with the requirements of the civil-service rules and without being accorded a classified status.
This order is recommended by the Secretary of the Treasury.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7051-Authorizing the Appointment of Guy C. Hanna to a Position in the Treasury Department Without Regard to Civil-Service Rules Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/376112
